sent_1.text: PATIENTS AND METHODS : Eligibility requirements were resected locally advanced ( LA ; T3 b - 4 or N1 - 3 ) or metastatic ( M1 ) RCC , no prior systemic therapy , and excellent organ function .

sent_2.text: Randomized assignment was to one course of IL - 2 ( 600,000 U / kg every 8 hours on days 1 to 5 and days 15 to 19 [ maximum 28 doses ] ) or observation .

sent_3.text: The study was designed and powered to show an improvement in predicted 2 - year disease - free survival ( DFS ) from 40 % for the observation group to 70 % for the treatment group .

entity_7.text: predicted 2 - year disease - free survival ( DFS )

sent_4.text: The accrual goal was 68 patients with LA disease , with 34 patients per treatment arm .

sent_5.text: Metastasectomy patients were to be analyzed separately because of their unpredictable natural history .
